about_the_game:
Defeat Powerful Samurai With Your Blade

Journey Across the beautiful lands of Samurai Yokai as a mythical tengu samurai, fighting foes with a dynamic combat system allowing you to deflect the powerful attacks of samurai. Attack with lightning abilities to take revenge upon the samurai and soldiers of this world.

Deflection

Engage in skillful combat inspired by samurai legends. Deflect the deadly attacks of towering foes, including cursed samurai and supernatural yokai like the Tengu, known for their brutal strength.

Execute Your Enemies

Execute enemies in a variety of stylish ways with your blade, axe and bare strength.

Unlock New Abilities To Find Hidden Secrets And Areas

Channel the power of Raijin with abilities like the "Thunder Axe" to unleash electrifying attacks, or the “Cloud Step”, allowing you to scale unreachable heights. Harness these skills to find hidden paths, ancient relics, and forbidden areas veiled in mist.

Deflect Bullets Back At Enemies

Story

In Samurai Yokai, you enter a land on the brink of ruin, where myth and darkness intertwine. As a warrior bound to a powerful totem, you are drawn into a battle against a tyrannical force spreading across Japan. Monuments, temples, and followers worship a cruel leader whose ambition threatens to extinguish any remaining light.

Haunted by the past, you journey through mystical forests, desolate tundras, and ruined villages, facing spirits and warriors consumed by corruption. Armed with the powers of Raijin, the thunder god, and other totems you reclaim along the way, your path is one of vengeance, redemption, and uncovering the truths hidden in this shadowed realm.

Your journey will test your strength and resolve as you battle for honor in a world where legends, curses, and the spirit realm collide.

content_descriptors.notes: Involves pixel art blood effects and sword-fighting violence. Players can also perform executions on enemies.

short_description: Samurai Yokai is a 2D souls-like metroidvania inspired by Sekiro and Japanese myth. Fight cursed samurai and yokai using deflections and lightning powers. Ascend on cloud platforms, reflect the bullets of foes, explore lush forests, frozen tundras, and uncover secrets deep within.
